Detailed Description

Introduction

Purpose and Scope

References

-# Ethernet Media Access Controller User Guide

Introduction

Purpose and Scope

The EMAC supports Gigabit Media Independent Interface, which is connected to the external device through Serial Gigabit Media Independent Interface (SGMII) with SerDes.

References

  1. EMAC User's Guide SPRUFC4.pdf (May 2008)

Assumptions

The abbreviations SGMII, Sgmii & sgmii have been used throughout this document to refer to Serial Gigabit Media Independent Interface
